Class ShortJob

      • org.qbroker.monitor.ShortJob
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MonitorAction

    public class ShortJob
extends DummyAction
    ShortJob runs a short-lived script or a java job upon changes of the status of certain occurrence
    Author:
    yannanlu@yahoo.com
